title: Sakkas Kiera Short Sleeve Embroidered Eyelet Woven Shirt

The elegant, subtle floral embroidered eyelet fabric creates depth and texture while the 100% cotton fabric allows for weightlessness and breath-ability. Wear this top open or closed for a casual, feminine, beautiful summer look!
For a relaxed summer look, wear open with a bright tank and jean shorts.
Hand wash separately in cold water. Line dry. Imported. | Material: 100% Cotton
